sentence.Network_en: Candidates need a proposer and seconder whose names are kept secret.
sentence.Network_cn: 候选人需要一名匿名的推荐人兼支持者。

sentence.Network_en: Mr. Brown had been proposed by Mr. Jones, and Miss Smith was his seconder.
sentence.Network_cn: 琼斯先生建议布朗先生, 史密斯小姐是附议者.

sentence.Network_en: The proposer and seconder must be ordinary life member of the Maha Bodhi School Alumni.
sentence.Network_cn: 上述推荐及附议者必须是普提学校校友会之普通或永久会员.
